attributes.action: Spend all revenue raised via road tax to be spent on roads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the ammount of money raised via road tax, its a disgrace that UK drivers should be driving on some of the worst roads in europe. Road tax money should be spent on roads and pavements up to a point that they are suitable and safe for their purpose

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
